Sentencas: For the promotion of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC), it is essential to improve the applicability of cogeneration systems based on SOFCs in buildings.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: In this study, a cogeneration system which uses a thermoelectric generator and an absorption heat pump to recover the waste heat of SOFC exhaust gas was proposed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: Based on the cogeneration system, a novel system configuration strategy that can adjust the system's heat-to-power ratio was developed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: By implementing this strategy, four configurations (in which the locations of the waste heat recovery components are different) were formed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: A mathematical model was established to evaluate the thermodynamic performance of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: In order to make use of the cold fluid of the thermoelectric generators, the influence of the circulating water utilization mode on system performance was firstly studied.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: Second, the performance differences among the four configurations under the designated and variable conditions were analyzed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the mode in which water is cycled between the thermoelectric generator and the absorber of the absorption heat pump is the most efficient.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: By implementing the aforementioned configuration strategy, the system's heat-to-power ratio can be adjusted within two intervals ranging from 0.8 to 2.4 and from 4.2 to 9.5.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump

Sentencas: Therefore, this novel configuration strategy for the cogeneration system delivers superior performance in responding to the needs of the energy demand side, and thus can help widen the application scenarios of SOFC cogeneration systems.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of a system configuration strategy for a cogeneration system combining SOFC, thermoelectric generator, and absorption heat pump
